title: Veigar
body: Ok so I was playing Veigar to see how hard they hurt him and my first impressions on his q is that its more a buff then a nerf as you can get 2 ap per q if you use it right then you look at his stun it is ridiculously hard to hit even if you trap them they can still dodge your w which is basically the only way to hit it I do agree with the delay but make the center smaller pls otherwise w is basically a none used spell except for in team figts even then its hard to hit

I hope you aren't dumb enough to know that the reason the put that on his "E" is because people can actually dodge it so its not an instant box. ----(hard to hit -----------even if you trap them they can still dodge your w" -Mar3thyu)

except like ya know, he has the LOWEST winrate at the moment. His Q got buffed, and that's good! His E can be dodged by anyone. Once it's been cast, that's it. Your opponent can guess where you put it, and they get 0.75 seconds to dodge that %%%%. That's easy.

Um Ahri's Charm is hard to dodge compared to veigar's stun. I have trapped people in the center and they are able to walk out before the delay finishes, it is also hard to predict where to put his w as they will just move slightly and dodge it completely.

he's got minor changes on PBE right now. The delay to his stun is the same amount but starts earlier so it technically gives people .25 seconds less time to react.
Basically he no longer has a cast time on his E, just the .75s delay.

It will also now stop dashes that hit the wall instead of stunning people where they dash to which is actually really awesome.
